Storage-allDirectories.sublime-snippet.description: Returns an array of all the directories within a given directory and all of its sub-directories

Storage-allFiles.sublime-snippet.description: Returns an array of all of the files in a directory and it's sub-directories

Storage-append.sublime-snippet.description: Insert content at the end of a file

Storage-cleanDirectory.sublime-snippet.description: Empty the specified directory of all files and folders.

Storage-copy.sublime-snippet.description: Copy an existing file to another location on the disk

Storage-delete.sublime-snippet.description: Remove one or multiple files from the disk

Storage-deleteDirectory.sublime-snippet.description: May be used to remove a directory, including all of its files, from the disk

Storage-directories.sublime-snippet.description: Returns an array of all the directories within a given directory

Storage-extension.sublime-snippet.description: Extract the file extension from a file path.

Storage-files.sublime-snippet.description: Returns an array of all of the files in a directory

Storage-get.sublime-snippet.description: Retrieve the contents of a given file

Storage-isDirectory.sublime-snippet.description: Determine if the given path is a directory.

Storage-isFile.sublime-snippet.description: Determine if the given path is a directory.

Storage-isWritable.sublime-snippet.description: Determine if the given path is writable.

Storage-lastModified.sublime-snippet.description: Returns the UNIX timestamp of the last time the file was modified

Storage-makeDirectory.sublime-snippet.description: Will create the given directory, including any needed sub-directories

Storage-mimeType.sublime-snippet.description: Get the mime-type of a given file.

Storage-move.sublime-snippet.description: Move an existing file to a new location on the disk

Storage-name.sublime-snippet.description: Extract the file name from a file path.

Storage-prepend.sublime-snippet.description: Insert content at the beginning of a file

Storage-size.sublime-snippet.description: Get the size of the file in bytes

Storage-type.sublime-snippet.description: Get the file type of a given file.
